pr_title: HDDS-3501. OzoneFileStatus should not extend FileStatus

timeline.message: HDDS-3501. OzoneFileStatus should not extend FileStatus

timeline.bodyText: How do we plan to map the dir/dir permission into Ozone ACLs? It is currently hard coded to 777 for dir and 666 for file.
